unnormalised: Arre yaar, Civil Law is such a headache! My chacha had a property dispute going on for like, 10 years! The case was filed in the district court on 02/03/2014, and only got resolved last month. Advocate Sharma charged him Rs. 50,000 just for the initial filing. Hope no one else has to go through that jhanjhat.
normalised: Arre yaar, Civil Law is such a headache! My chacha had a property dispute going on for like, ten years! The case was filed in the district court on second march two thousand and fourteen, and only got resolved last month. Advocate Sharma charged him rupee fifty thousand just for the initial filing. Hope no one else has to go through that jhanjhat.
